dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice ID: 112-28652Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 12, 2005 2:23 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; minitab-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice ID: 112-28652Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice ID: 112-28652Copyright Infringement
Date: Mon, 12 Dec 2005 09:41:30 -0800
From: minitab-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
Reply-To: minitab-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

112-28652
12 Dec 2005 17:37:28 GMT


Dear Sir or Madam:

Minitab Inc., and its affiliated companies (collectively, "Minitab
Inc.") are the exclusive owners of copyrights and other proprietary rights
in numerous software properties, including but not limited to Minitab.

It has come to our attention that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
is the service provider for the IP address listed below, from which
unauthorized copying and distribution (downloading, uploading, file serving,
file "swapping" or other similar activities) of Minitab Inc.
property(s) listed below is taking place.  We believe that the Internet
access of the user engaging in this infringement is provided by
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. or a downstream service provider who
purchases this connectivity from ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc..

This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act.  Depending upon
the type of service ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is providing to
this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not
expeditiously remove or disable access to the
property(s) listed below, or if it fails to implement a policy that provides
for termination of subscribers who are repeat infringers (see,
17 U.S.C. 512).

Despite the above, Minitab Inc. believes that the entire Internet community
benefits when these matters are resolved cooperatively.  We urge you to take
immediate action to stop this infringing activity and immediately inform us
of the results of your actions.  We appreciate your efforts toward this
common goal.

The undersigned has a good faith belief that use of the property(s) in the
manner described herein is not authorized by Minitab Inc., its agent or the
law.  The information contained in this notification is accurate.
 Under penalty of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of
Minitab Inc. with respect to this matter.

All correspondence should be directed through:
http://webreply.baytsp.com/webreply/webreply.jsp?customerid=112&commhash=336
446a12e02820a0c70e7e95e91840c.
 Do not reply to this email.  Please send us a prompt response indicating
the actions you have taken to resolve this matter, making sure to reference
the Notice ID number above in your response.

Please be advised that this letter is not and is not intended to be a
complete statement of the facts or law as they may pertain to this matter or
of Minitab Inc.' positions, rights or remedies, legal or equitable, all of
which are specifically reserved.

Very truly yours,

Sarah Bergman
Compliance Manager
BayTSP, Inc.
PO Box 1314
Los Gatos, CA 95031

v: 408-341-2300
f:  408-341-2399
minitab@copyright-compliance.com

*pgp public key is available on the key server at ldap://keyserver.pgp.com

Note:  The information transmitted in this Notice is intended only for the
person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential
and/or privileged material.  Any review, reproduction, retransmission,
dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon,
this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is
prohibited.  If you received this in error, please contact the sender and
delete the material from all computers.



Evidentiary Information:
Notice ID:  28652
Asset:  Minitab Statistical Software Version 14 for Windows
Protocol:  Gnutella
IP Address:  70.85.188.58
DNS:
File Name:  Minitab v13.2 crack.zip
File Size:  202250
Timestamp:  11 Dec 2005 22:25:10 GMT
Last Seen Date:  11 Dec 2005 22:25:10 GMT
URL:
Username (if available):



- ---Start ACNS XML

chema.xsd">

America</Address>

  </Complainant>

    <Address>1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX</Address>

  </Service_Provider>
  <Source>
    <IP_Address>70.85.188.58</IP_Address>
    <DNS_Name></DNS_Name>

    <Deja_Vu>False</Deja_Vu>
  </Source>

Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
